articles.author: ASHOK SHARMA
articles.title: Ratan Tata, an Indian industry legend and business icon dies aged 86 - The Associated Press
articles.description: Ratan Tata, one of India’s most influential business leaders, has been cremated after a state funeral in the country’s financial capital. The veteran industrialist, former chairman of a $100 billion conglomerate Tata Group, died at a Mumbai hospital on Wednes…
articles.content: NEW DELHI (AP) Ratan Tata, one of Indias most influential business leaders, was cremated after a state funeral in the countrys financial capital on Thursday. The veteran industrialist, former chairma… [+5217 chars]
